input.sentences: my parents invited us to a picnic at their house .
we were all having a nice time visiting .
i showed off my new tattoo .
both of my sisters got similar tattoos when they found out about mine !
output.sentences: My parents were having a picnic and invited me to come.
I was very excited to visit and to spend time with my family.
They even had temporary tattoos for everyone to put on.
My sisters and brother all put one on just like me.
We all had such a wonderful time. I really enjoyed getting to spend time with my sisters and the rest of my family.
